short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your USC web registration checkout request will be submitted automatically every 40 seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Since Web Registration does not process partial registration, you should only have 1 pending course. You should prevent your computer to sleep when using this extension. For example, on a Mac, type "sudo pmset disablesleep 1‚Äù in the Terminal app and enter your log in password. You can reset it by "sudo pmset disablesleep 0".
